00010 // TPointValidator class
00011 
00012 // A Validator for Point values.
00013 
00014 /****************************************************************************/
00015 
00021 class LIBVB4_EXPORT TPointValidator : public TValueValidator
00022 {
00023 public:
00029     TPointValidator(QObject *parent = 0, int xmin = INT_MIN, int xmax = INT_MAX, int ymin = INT_MIN, int ymax = INT_MAX);
00030     // Destructor.
00031     virtual ~TPointValidator() {};
00032 
00033     virtual EValidateResult checkValue(QVariant& value);
00034 
00035 
00037     static TPointValidator  *s_PointValidator;
00038 
00039 protected:
00040     int m_xmin, m_xmax, m_ymin, m_ymax;
00041 };

00045 // TPointValue class
00046 
00047 // Represents a point value class which allows to deal with QPoint
00048 
00049 /****************************************************************************/
00050 
00056 class LIBVB4_EXPORT TPointValue : public TBaseValue
00057 {
00058 public:
00064     TPointValue (TValueBrowser *parent, const QString& name, int page = -1, int id = -1);
00069     TPointValue (TBaseItem *parent, const QString& name,  int id = -1);
00070     // Destructor.
00071     virtual ~TPointValue();
00072 
00074     QPoint          point() const       { return m_set.value.toPoint(); }
00075 
00076     virtual QString valueText() const;
00077 
00079     void            writeValue(QPoint &value)   
00080     { value = m_set.value.toPoint(); }
00081 
00082 
00083     // Returns item's type name.
00084     virtual char*   ItemID() { return "TPointValue"; }
00085 
00087     static void     setDefaultExpandableItems(bool b)       { s_showExpandables = b; }
00088 
00089 protected:  
00090     // internal
00091     void    construct();
00092 
00093     // internal
00094     virtual void    doUpdateFromChild(TBaseValue *child);
00095     virtual void    doUpdateChildren();
00096     virtual void    doCreateChildren();
00097 
00098     TIntegerValue *ivX, *ivY;
00099 
00100     static bool s_showExpandables;
00101 };

00235 // TRectValue class
00236 
00237 // Represents a rectangular value class which allows to deal with QRect
00238 
00239 /****************************************************************************/
00240 
00246 class LIBVB4_EXPORT TRectValue : public TBaseValue
00247 {
00248 public:
00254     TRectValue (TValueBrowser *parent, const QString& name, int page = -1, int id = -1);
00259     TRectValue (TBaseItem *parent, const QString& name,  int id = -1);
00260     // Destructor.
00261     virtual ~TRectValue();
00262 
00264     QRect           rect() const        { return m_set.value.toRect(); }
00266     QSize           size() const        { return rect().size(); }
00268     QPoint          point() const       { return rect().topLeft(); }
00269 
00270     virtual QString valueText() const;
00271 
00273     void            writeValue(QRect &value)    
00274     { value = m_set.value.toRect(); }
00275 
00276 
00277     virtual char*   ItemID() { return "TRectValue"; }
00278 
00280     static void     setDefaultExpandableItems(bool b)       { s_showExpandables = b; }
00281 
00282 protected:  
00283     // internal
00284     void    construct();
00285 
00286     // internal
00287     virtual void    doUpdateFromChild(TBaseValue *child);
00288     virtual void    doUpdateChildren();
00289     virtual void    doCreateChildren();
00290 
00291     TIntegerValue *ivW, *ivH;
00292     TIntegerValue *ivX, *ivY;
00293 
00294     static bool s_showExpandables;
00295 };
